author: Cointelegraph by Nancy Lubale
title: Classic XRP price chart pattern targets $5 as spot ETF reality draws closer
description: XRP analysts believe in the potential to rebound to new all-time highs over the next few weeks or months as spot ETF approval odds in 2025 rise to 87%.
content:
Key takeaways:
